column4: Hey, I've been trying to install feisty, and the installation hangs after the message "Installed openoffice.org-java-common-x.x.x"
if you press ALT+F4 it takes you to a console where they may be an error message..?
(and also poked for half an hour with the VT)
which it couldn't, because the network wasn't properly set up
the CD is fine - the md5sum was good, and k3b verified the disk fully
2Gb RAM, which didn't fail memtest after an hour or so
I have seen machines from for 12 hours then fail
true, but I don't think memory's at fault
run it anyway when you're asleep, lets you rule it out :)
